metadata.title: The final Battle of the disturbance

tracks.text: A flaming phoenix logo and the word Kadokawa reflect in water.
Masked Demiurge and Evil Eye stare at Momon
Momon turns to Demiurge, who bows.
Momon swings his twin swords. Jaldabaoth blocks with his demon claws.
Swing. Block. Claws. Parry. Swing. Dodge. Swipe. Block.
Evil Eye looks at her chest.
Momon charges, feints, strikes, dashes, strikes, pushing Jaldabaoth back
Ainz holds a golden staff. Albedo stares. Shalltear glances. The elf twins raise their heads. Demiurge smiles. Cocytus turns. Sebas stares. Ainz's eye burns red.
An army of lizard men march under dark clouds.
Text, Overlord 2
Yusu walks, carrying Frostpane. Shasuryu and Zenberu walk with him.
Cocytus marches, carrying an axe. An army of skeletons with swords marches behind him.
Zero walks. Succulent, Edstrom, Malmvist, Davernoch, and Peshurian walk behind him.
The Blue Rose party walks.
Climb, Brain, and Gazef walk.
A masked blond woman in white and Evil Eye, in black, stand back to back, spinning around.
Ainz walks towards the horizon. Albedo, Shalltear, the twins, Demiurge, Cocytus, and Sebas join him.
Ainz stops and looks back.
Maids drop from the sky: Yuri Alpha, Lupusregina Beta, Narberal Gamma, Solution Epsilon, a maid in an eyepatch, and Entoma Zeta.
Zero punches at Sebas, who evades.
Yusu charges through the marsh, wielding frostpane. He leaps and swings at Cocytus.
Climb wears shining armor and holds a sword.
Evil Eye flies. Blue shards fire around her and land near Entoma.
Jaldabaoth uses claws to parry Momon's long swords. Behind the pair, the city burns.
Princess Renner smiles at us from the castle.
Crush Lulu smiles at us from the Razor Tail Tribe village.
Tuare, in a maid outfit, smiles from a field a daisies.
Shalltear looks up at a galaxy. Albedo stares lustfully. Ainz sits on a throne under the flag of Ainz Ooal Goan.

People turn to us from the shadows: Climb, Gazef, Brain, Renner, Zanac and Raven, Lakyus Aindra, Gagaran, Tia and Tina, Evil Eye, Zenberu, Shasuryu, Victim, a golem, Piki the bartender, Pestonya, and Eclair
Text, Chapter 12, The final battle of the disturbance
The blond woman nods, hiding her face
Brain frowns
The 4 run down the hallway. They pause at a corner.
Lockmeier looks around, sees something, grabs a dagger, and flies back against Climb.
Climb looks up to see Brain blocking Zero
Zero is a bald, muscular man covered in tattoos.
Brain smiles
Zero puts a fist out and pulls another back. He takes a back stepped horse stance. Brain takes a quick draw stance.
The blond woman steps forward. Climb glances. A potion rolls across the floor. Lumiere glows with healing.
Lockmeier throws a dart. The blond woman dodges.
Tuare's face changes into Succulent's. He wears the maid outfit.
Zero's fist gouges the wall. Brain steps back.
Zero charges. Brain swings his sword. It deflects off Zero's fist. Swing. Deflect.
Climb blocks a sword swing and steps back.
He pants, a cut across his cheek. He stares down 5 maid Succulents.
Lockmeier tosses a bag. It erupts in smoke.
One Succulent glows
Climb swings at the glowing Succulent. The others vanish.
Lockmeier tosses a blue potion. Succulent bats it. It breaks into blue smoke and he coughs.
Climb leaps, swinging overhead. Succulent blocks. Climb kicks. Succulent blocks his stomach with his knee. Climb kicks his balls. Succulent's eyes bulge. Lockmeier winces.
Zero punches. Brain blocks with his sword.
Climb and Lockmeier run up. Zero looks.
Brain sheaths his sword and takes a quick draw stance. He smiles. Zero steps back.
A ring glows around Brain
Tuare emerges, wrapped in a blanket.
Brain smiles
His tattoos glow
He punches Sebas squarely in the chest.
Lockmeier, Climb, and Brain gape
Sebas frowns, unblemished.
Sebas raises a leg in the air and brigns it down on Zero's head. Zero buckles and blood streams down his face.
Zero falls limp. The men gape. Sebas dusts off his chest.
The men stare.
Jaldabaoth swipes. Momon blocks.
Momon charges. Jaldabaoth leaps
Bat wings expand and shards rain down from them.
Evil Eye covers her head. A shadow covers her. She looks up.
Momon swings his blades like propellors, slicing the shards.
Momon picks a tentacle out from a crack
Momon picks up Evil Eye
Under the arm
Jaldabaoth rises into the sky and disappears
Momon and Nabe look at Evil Eye, bending over Tia and Gagaran
Momon clenches a fist. Nabe grits her teeth.
Momon loosens. Nabe growls.
They gather across the yard
He puts up a barrier
She nods
Momon looks down. Nabe smiles up at him.
Momon walks away
Evil Eye wraps up the 2 bodies.
In the distance, a cylinder of fire rises hundreds of feet in the air.
Climb, Brain, and Lockmeier walk away from the Six Arms base. Sebas walks behind them, princess carrying Tuare.
Tuare opens her eyes and smiles up at Sebas. Climb glances back at the two.
Climb stares up at the cylinder of fire, a short ways ahead of him.
It rises above a section of the city.
Sebas gapes
Townspeople gape at the wall of fire. Lakyus stands with soldiers. She frowns at the wall.
Soldiers on the capital wall stare at the fire. Gazef stands among them, frowning.
Renner stands at her window and stares.
Momon, Nabe, and Evil Eye stare
Evil Eye stares up at Momon
Boardroom. Renner addresses a group of adventurers. Gazef and Lakyus stand behind her
Renner glances
The castle stands in the night. The wall of fire glitters across the city.
Renner's map depicts a circle and arrows
The adventurers' faces harden.
Renner looks around.
Climb bows to Lockmeier
Adventurers stand in groups
A silver ring
Gazef smiles
Climb gapes. Brain pats his shoulder.
The adventurers gather in the garden in the night. Elsewhere, in the boardroom in the castle, Raeven and Zanac stare at Renner's map. She stares out a window.
They frown
She turns
They startle. She smiles, wide and thin, with wide eyes
